rows.label: tlk70000071_01_msg0001
rows.name: How's that Barney Stone search going?

rows.label: tlk70000071_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You haven't forgotten, have you? That
famed adventurer who sealed up treasure
and monster alike in stones.

rows.label: tlk70000071_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Touch the stone, defeat the
monsters that come out, then
you get to keep all the goodies.

rows.label: tlk70000071_01_msg0004
rows.name:
But don't worry about it! It's not like
any normal person's going to stumble
across the treasure, so take your time.
